name: Badoo - Dark Background & Colored Text
description:
This is a very Dark Theme for Badoo.

Login-, Live- and Payment-Pages are not fully implemented !!!!!

This is my first Theme. Actually, I just wanted to do it for myself. But since it was better than expected, I would like to share it with others. Please forgive me if it is not perfect yet. I'm still learning how to do! ;-)

The most important elements are done. But I'm still working on it, if I have enough time.
additional_info:
Changelog:

20-22. Im back with tons of fixes.
16-19. Some Colors fixed.
15. Some Ads has been hidden.
10-14. Some Design-Changes fixed.
9. Messenger and many other Items improved.
8. Dashboard and Usercard-Image Colors fixed.
7. Background of Messenger Overlay fixed.
6. Login-/Sign-Page added. Not finished, but sufficient to use.
5. Text Color Improvments...
4. Lots of Improvments...
3. More elements made dark.
2. Background Color optimized (slightly darker)
1. Initial Release
css:
@-moz-document domain(badoo.com) {
/*
-----------------------------------
Created by: pomm
-----------------------------------
Version:  1.22
Date:     08/2019 (day 31)
-----------------------------------
*/

    .messenger__close,

    }

    }

    .connection-banner__title,
    .connection-header__status,
    .radio-field__text,

    .user-card__referer-text,

    .connection-header__user--link {

    .has-surprise-test.abtest-advertising_placement_on_web--ads_inline .messenger-ovl__footer-surprise,
